name: Klay Rabbit in the Dino Land
name_original: Klay Rabbit in the Dino Land
description:
◈◈Klay Rabbit in the Dino Land◈◈

The Retro classic action adventure platform game, I played as a kid.

Not only do you have to get to your destination, you have to end the game through adventure.

The Klay Rabbit is a story-focused game. Also, it is composed of hommage levels.

◈◈caution◈◈

When you use a smartphone, you may not be able to jump twice.

Press the 2X jump option in the upper left corner of the screen.

also

It's only for PC, but I made it possible to play on mobile.

However, depending on the smartphone, there may be a problem with the game's movement of the game.

◈◈Story◈◈

Peaceful village of Klay Rabbit.

One day, a red light shone in the sky.

Klay Rabbit, who followed the red light up the hill, finds someone.

He said he was a cat wizard.

The Cat Wizard told us why he came to the world of Klay Rabbit.

"The red crystal I was studying broke, creating a portal, and at the same time, parts of the dinosaur island and dinosaurs were sucked into the world together," said the Cat Wizard.

And

 "I need a broken piece of red crystal to go back to where I lived," he said.

Klay Rabbit and the Cat Wizard go on an adventure together to find the red crystal...

◈◈Operation key ◈◈

Move: ← , → ( A , D)

Jump: Space

Melee Attack: X

Range Attack: C
